Performer:
179.md (吉田清五郎)

Alternate Name: Toyomatsu Seigorō (豊松清五郎)

Dates: '1986/11-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Puppeteer:

March 1987: The Miracle at the Tsubosaka Kannon Temple

April 1987: The Tycoon's Exploit

September 1987: A Tragic Love Triangle

November 1987: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

February 1988: The Twins and the Sumida River

March 1988: The Trouble in the Date Household

August 1988: The Dancing Mushrooms

January 1989: The Amorous Courier

February 1989: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

August 1989: The Rat's Romance

September 1989: The Love-Inspired Murder

November 1989: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil

January 1990: Kagekiyo and His Daughter

February 1990: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

July 1990: The Nunobiki Waterfall

September 1990: The Adachi Plain in Oshu

December 1990: The Amorous Courier

February 1991: Gonza the Lancer

April 1991: The Old Tale of Kusunoki

May 1991: The Miracle at the Tsubosaka Kannon Temple

August 1991: The Courier for Hell

January 1992: Oshun and Dembei

April 1992: The Vendetta in Iga

May 1992: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

July 1992: Masakiyo's Loyalty

August 1992: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil

November 1992: The Stone Monument of Glory

January 1993: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

February 1993: The Courier for Hell

August 1993: The Red Battle Surcoat

November 1993: The Nunobiki Waterfall

May 1995: The Story of the Morning Glory

August 1995: Gonza the Lancer
